response_parsed.title: Securing Data Pipelines Using FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to implement security measures in data pipelines using FastAPI, a modern web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: Understanding the importance of securing data pipelines in API development
Using FastAPI's built-in security features and third-party libraries
Leveraging rate limiting and CORS management for better protection
Setting up secure connections using SSL/TLS

code_examples.code:
from fastapi.middleware.cors import CORSMiddleware

# ... (Your FastAPI app setup)

app = FastAPI()

# Configure CORS policy
app.add_middleware(CORSMiddleware, allow_origins=['*'], allow_methods=['*'], allow_headers=['*'])

version_notes: This guide focuses on Python 3.12+ and FastAPI v0.75.1.
